languages.text: "Рад знать, что в другом мире у него тоже все хорошо. Но еще больше я рад, что ты не притащил{mf||а} сюда своего Соломона — я бы не хотел поднимать руку на Глейто, пусть и чужого".

"I am glad to hear he is doing well in another world too. But I am even more glad that you did not drag your Solomorne here — I would hate to raise my hand against Glaito, even one who is not my dog."
languages.original_text: "Рад знать, что в другом мире у него тоже все хорошо. Но еще больше я рад, что ты не притащил{mf||а} сюда своего Соломона — я бы не хотел поднимать руку на Глейто, пусть и чужого".

traits.locale_text: "I am glad to hear he is doing well in another world too. But I am even more glad that you did not drag your Solomorne here — I would hate to raise my hand against Glaito, even one who is not my dog."

"I am glad to hear he is doing well in another world too. But I am even more glad that you did not drag your Solomorne here — I would hate to raise my hand against Glaito, even one who is not my dog."

languages.text: “听说格雷托在你的世界也过得很好，我很高兴。更让我高兴的是，你没有把你身边那位索罗蒙带过来。我真的一点都不想和你的格雷托动手，哪怕它不是我的狗。”
languages.original_text: "I am glad to hear he is doing well in another world too. But I am even more glad that you did not drag your Solomorne here — I would hate to raise my hand against Glaito, even one who is not my dog."

traits.locale_text: “听说格雷托在你的世界也过得很好，我很高兴。更让我高兴的是，你没有把你身边那位索罗蒙带过来。我真的一点都不想和你的格雷托动手，哪怕它不是我的狗。”

languages.text: «Me alegro de saber que también le va bien en otro mundo. Pero me alegro aún más de que no haya traído aquí a su Solomorne. Odiaría tener que levantarle la mano a Glaito, aunque no sea mi perro».
languages.original_text: "I am glad to hear he is doing well in another world too. But I am even more glad that you did not drag your Solomorne here — I would hate to raise my hand against Glaito, even one who is not my dog."

traits.locale_text: «Me alegro de saber que también le va bien en otro mundo. Pero me alegro aún más de que no haya traído aquí a su Solomorne. Odiaría tener que levantarle la mano a Glaito, aunque no sea mi perro».

languages.text: « Je me réjouis de voir qu'il se porte bien dans un autre monde. Mais je me réjouis encore plus que vous n'ayez pas amené votre Solomorne jusqu'ici. Je n'ai aucune envie de lever la main sur Glaito, même si celui-ci n'est pas mon chien. »
languages.original_text: "I am glad to hear he is doing well in another world too. But I am even more glad that you did not drag your Solomorne here — I would hate to raise my hand against Glaito, even one who is not my dog."

traits.locale_text: « Je me réjouis de voir qu'il se porte bien dans un autre monde. Mais je me réjouis encore plus que vous n'ayez pas amené votre Solomorne jusqu'ici. Je n'ai aucune envie de lever la main sur Glaito, même si celui-ci n'est pas mon chien. »

languages.text: 「彼が別の惑星でも元気にしていると聞いて嬉しいです。でも、あなたがソロモーンをここに連れてこなかったことのほうがもっと嬉しいです。たとえ自分の犬でなくても、グライトに手をあげるのは嫌ですから」
languages.original_text: "I am glad to hear he is doing well in another world too. But I am even more glad that you did not drag your Solomorne here — I would hate to raise my hand against Glaito, even one who is not my dog."

traits.locale_text: 「彼が別の惑星でも元気にしていると聞いて嬉しいです。でも、あなたがソロモーンをここに連れてこなかったことのほうがもっと嬉しいです。たとえ自分の犬でなくても、グライトに手をあげるのは嫌ですから」

languages.text: "Başka bir dünyada da iyi olmasına sevindim. Fakat Solomorne'u buraya sürüklememene daha da sevindim. Benim köpeğim olmasa bile Glaito'ya el kaldırmaktan nefret ederdim."
languages.original_text: "I am glad to hear he is doing well in another world too. But I am even more glad that you did not drag your Solomorne here — I would hate to raise my hand against Glaito, even one who is not my dog."

traits.locale_text: "Başka bir dünyada da iyi olmasına sevindim. Fakat Solomorne'unu buraya sürüklememene daha da sevindim. Glaito'ya, benim köpeğim olmasa bile el kaldırmaktan nefret ederdim."

languages.text: "Es freut mich, zu hören, dass es ihm in einer anderen Welt auch gut geht. Noch mehr freut mich allerdings, dass Ihr Euren Solomorne nicht hergebracht habt – ich würde ungern meine Hand gegen Glaito erheben, auch wenn er nicht mein Hund ist."
languages.original_text: "I am glad to hear he is doing well in another world too. But I am even more glad that you did not drag your Solomorne here — I would hate to raise my hand against Glaito, even one who is not my dog."

traits.locale_text: "Es freut mich, zu hören, dass es ihm in einer anderen Welt auch gut geht. Noch mehr freut mich allerdings, dass Ihr Euren Solomorne nicht hergebracht habt – ich würde ungern meine Hand gegen Glaito erheben, auch wenn er nicht mein Hund ist."
